task.summary: added a method for easier configuration of the system using a DSL. so far everything i need is supported but ecliptic inclination,
added manual setting of initial velocity to DSL
constants fixed, todo was solved overtime
- it's no longer possible to mix angle-based and absolute positions in the dsl.
- acceleration is no longer stored in the objects because the information is not needed.
- added a test for checking if the system keeps it's rotational impulse
- refactored mathematical integrity tests into another test class - added another planet to the test system.
window is resizeable and contents are resized, too
added more commenting to the simulation classe.
added build file for ant build of the application.
added new options to the DSL for defining moons relative to other planets.
- renamed null output to terminal output - added help text

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - renamed null output to terminal output - added help text
